predicate.note: Frames file for 'arrange' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry build-26.1, put-9.1, other framed members include assemble, build, churn, (re)shape, roll, spin; put and place. Comparison with 'assemble' and 'put'.

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: Mr. Panet-Raymond said he doesn't think [Messrs. Drabinsky and Gottlieb]-1 are ``anywhere close'' to *trace*-1 arranging financing. offer before the stock begins to rise again .

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Security Pacific, meanwhile, said [it]-2 expects *trace*-2 to arrange $430 million in bank loans for Vitro.

example.name: with other args
example.text: John arranged his clean laundry from a neat stack into an untidy pile.
